function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Crowded living conditions leading to the spread of communicable diseases","Impact":"Increased risk of volatile infections and droplet-transmitted infections","Mitigation":"Designing completely detached housing with surrounding garden space and touchless experiences in multi-story buildings","Technologies":"Smart home technology, touchless entry systems, and architectural design","People":"Residents in high-density housing, multi-story buildings, and crowded environments","Owner":"Architects, urban planners, and housing developers"},{"Description":"Lack of social isolation and protection from viruses in housing","Impact":"Vulnerability to infections and lack of safe spaces for quarantine","Mitigation":"Creating housing that provides social isolation, space for indoor gardens, and healing effects of light, air, and nature","Technologies":"Smart home technology, indoor gardening systems, and architectural design","People":"Residents and occupants of homes","Owner":"Architects, urban planners, and housing developers"},{"Description":"Inadequate office space for remote working","Impact":"Inability to accommodate remote working needs, leading to overcrowding and increased risk of virus transmission","Mitigation":"Redesigning office spaces to accommodate remote working, flexible and adaptable spaces for all users, and measures to promote social distancing","Technologies":"Smart office technology, flexible workspace design, and remote working tools","People":"Employees and employers in office buildings","Owner":"Office managers, employers, and commercial real estate owners"}]}
